department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Expired: All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement:  ACAN for Nunavut Fuels

## Important Notice

Due to a modification, the closing time for this tender has been extended to October 28, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. EDT.

### Tender Overview

* **Reference Number:** WS3664332123-Doc3705812890
* **Publication Date:** October 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 28, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3664332123
* **Tender Status:** The tender is expired.

### Procurement Details

* **UNSPSC:** Naphtha, Aviation Fuel, and Diesel Fuel
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **NOTICE TYPE:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nunavut Territory
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Eligibility and Conditions of Tender

This tender is for the supply of fuels (naphtha, aviation fuel, and diesel fuel) to the Government of Canada, specifically to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in the Nunavut Territory.

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Pam Munz
* **Email:** [pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14347336?extsite=MTQzNDczMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Please ensure to submit your required supporting documentation and bid submission by the specified deadline and time.

 replies after 2 p.m. EDT will result in your bid being declared non-responsive.

**Note:** This tender announcement is available online on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell and Ariba Discovery platforms.

Link to Government Tender Announcement: Official tenders on Buyandsell.gc.ca -> [link to tender announcement](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14347336?extsite=MTQzNDczMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
